name: Bad Courier Inc
description:
Intro

Hey, you must be the new recruit, welcome to Bad Courier Inc! 

As you know, we pride ourselves on always delivering packages at the most inconvenient of times. Why deliver when somebody is at home, when we can make their lives that much harder and deliver their packages when nobody is at home to collect them? Well, thats exactly what we do here!

You're a driver, so your tasks are to pick up the packages at the warehouse and deliver them to their destinations. For every package delivered when nobody is at home, you'll get a handsome bonus (on top of the normal delivery fee), and some extra time for your run!

Your shift ends when the timer runs out, and your score the day will be the amount of money you earned. Be careful though - watch the warehouse package count. If it ever hits its limit, your shift ends IMMEDIATELY. 

Well, what are you waiting for? The truck has gas - lets get going!

Known issue on MacOS (and maybe other platforms): sometimes the game crashes. Could be related to the beta version of Godot used.

Controls

Up Arrow / W: Forward
Down Arrow / S: Reverse
Left-Right Arrow / A-D: Steering
Space: Brake
